name: Vinhthuy T. Phan
content: Vinhthuy Phan - Computer Science - The University of Memphis Skip to main content SearchX Safety & Security Prospective Students Current Students Parents & Family Alumni Veterans Faculty & Staff People Take Action Follow Us Online FacebookLinkedIn Home Computer Science People Faculty Pages Vinhthuy Phan Vinhthuy Phan Associate Chair and Associate Professor Phone 901.678.1535 Email vphan@memphis.edu Fax 901.678.1506 Office Dunn Hall 309 Office Hours Call for hours Degree: PhD, Computer Science, Stony Brook University, 2003 Research Interests:Computer science education, applications of generative AI in education and research, data science, bioinformatics Personal Website:https://vtphan.github.io/ Google Scholar Dr. Phan is an Associate Professor and Associate Chair of the Department of Computer Science. His recent work in computer science education focuses on leveraging in-class coding exercises and generative AI to enable just-in-time and personalized interventions, enhance student performance prediction, and support active learning in programming courses. His research also examines strategies for improving feedback practices among teaching assistants and developing cloud-based platforms to facilitate in-class exercises in data science and machine learning courses. In bioinformatics, he develops computational approaches for bacterial identification in microbiomes and the analysis of sequencing and variant data. Across these domains, he applies machine learning and data mining techniques to improve both educational outcomes and biological data analysis.
